name: Rodina
description: A single-developer passion project. Seamless full scale solar system / balls-up action. Be part of the journey as a Universe is built from the ground up!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista, 7, or 8 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU with 512MB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Some users have reported problems with Intel cards. Please try the demo before buying Rodina!
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista, 7, or 8 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU with 1024MB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
